component.name: RewardsTheater
component.summary: An OBS plugin that lets your viewers redeem videos or sounds on stream via Twitch Channel Points

release.description: Update to new Twitch APIs. Old plugin versions will stop working in February-March 2025.
Automatically set "Restart playback when source becomes active" for all RewardsTheater sources
Added "Repeat video and stop after N seconds" option for GIFs. Improved VLC Video Source support. You don't have to manually uncheck "Show nothing when playback ends" anymore.
